name: Afghan Hawaiian
description: Afghan Hawaiian is an indica-dominant hybrid of UK Cheese and Lavender bred by Canadian LP OrganiGram, Inc. The sweet mix of earthy, cheese flavors has hints of licorice and caramel undertones and produces a rush of euphoria that levels off into deep relaxation. OrganiGram classifies Afghan Hawaiian with their NDS varieties and recommend it for neurological disorders and spasticity.
attributes_title: Tingly, Sleepy, Relaxed, Energetic, Aroused, Dry Mouth, Paranoid, Dizzy
